application_type_full: Prior Approval: Development for electronic communications network
borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions: The proposed monopole and cabinets by reason of its visual prominence, height, appearance and siting would result in dominant addition to the streetscene, would fail to respond to positive aspects of the surrounding area and the setting of nearby designated heritage asset. Consequently, the proposed development would cause less than substantial harm to the significance of the designated heritage asset. As such the proposal would result in unacceptable visual clutter. The proposed development would, therefore, conflict with policies:Policies D4, SI6, and HC1 of the London Plan (March 2021); Policy CP3 of the Core Strategy (July 2010);Policies BC12, BP3, BP8,  BP11 of the Borough Wide Development Policies DPD (March 2011); andPolicies SP 2 DMD 1, DMD 4, and Policy DMSI 9 of the LBBD draft Local Plan 2037 (Autumn 2021).

The development hereby approved shall only be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents:

  • BAD21472_BAD126_89956_RM1074_GA_REV_B -  002 Site Location Plan [Revision B] - 23/06/2023
  • BAD21472_BAD126_89956_RM1074_GA_REV_B - 215 Proposed Site Plan [Revision B] - 23/06/2023
  • BAD21472_BAD126_89956_RM1074_GA_REV_B - 265 Proposed Site Elevation [Revision B] - 23/06/2023

No other drawings or documents apply.
The development hereby permitted shall be commenced before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
description: Application for prior approval telecommunication: Proposed 5G telecoms installation: H3G 18m street pole and additional equipment cabinets.
